about: I'm a SDET with 3+ years of experience in both manual and automation testing. Successfully contributed to the delivery of three high-quality software products for clients. Passionate about learning new technologies, leveraging them to optimize processes, and explore their real-world impact.

educationExp.brief: Sample brief text about SSLC, secondary school leaving certificate.
Sample brief text about Pre-University Cources education.

educationExp.education: Bachlor of Engineering in Computer Science | BE Cse | 10th
educationExp.brief: Brief text about engineering and what we did there.

keyRespo: Developed and maintained scalable C# Selenium automation scripts using MSTest and the Page Object Model (POM) framework to reduce manual testing efforts and improve test reusability.

Designed and initiated the development of a custom Playwright + TypeScript test automation framework to replace legacy Selenium setup, offering faster execution, better parallelism, and expanded test coverage.
Managed automation scripts using Git by following version control best practices, ensuring seamless team collaboration and smooth pipeline integration.
Collaborated with clients and BAs to translate functional requirements into comprehensive test scenarios and cases, improving test coverage.
Executed Smoke, Functional, and Regression tests across different sprint phases, contributing to consistent, on-time, and high-quality releases.
Logged, tracked, and retested defects in Azure DevOps, helping reduce turnaround time and maintain application stability.
Actively participated in daily stand-ups and scrums to align test activities with sprint goals and address blockers early.
Performed post-release validation in production to ensure application stability and a seamless user experience with successful deployment.
Queried and validated database entries to ensure data accuracy across different application phases and workflows.
Actively monitored application resources and backend workflows via Azure Portal during end-to-end testing.
keyContr: Designed and implemented a reusable solution to manage the application's envirnoment data during automation execution
Developing playwright framework to migrate the existing lagacy selenium automation scripts.
